mapper.sql: id, name, title, detail, creater, create_timestamp
mapper.insert:
insert into course
id,
name,
title,
detail,
creater,
create_timestamp,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update course
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_timestamp = #{createTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_timestamp = #{createTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
